summary: Provides a suite of unit tests that validate NeMo’s Lhotse‑based data loading utilities across a wide range of scenarios, including loading cuts, handling shard files, processing multilingual text, applying noise, and combining datasets with weighting or channel selection.
business_intent: Guarantee that speech and multimodal data pipelines built on Lhotse and NeMo function correctly, enabling reliable training and evaluation of automatic speech recognition and related models.
